metadata.name: Santa 2099 Miami
metadata.description:
The Year: 2099
Location: Miami
Event: NFT
Time of Year: Christmas

Santa was on vaction as he always does every year before Christmas.

This year he decided to go to Miami, little did he know he was about to get a rude awakening when the NFT community descended on Miami.

Santa was fast asleep, enjoying his dreams of sugar plums and Brimstone when he was rudely awakened by crowds down below his hotel flat.

These were not the normal crowds he was used too, these were NFT crowds a different type of breed and noise.

As Santa tried to drown out the noise and go back to sleep, the noise got louder and louder..

He politely went to his balcony and asked the crowd to please keep it down.

Some of the people in the crowd to Santa to " FCUK OFF" and proceeded to throw things at him while he stood there watching. 

What happened next described by a witness was "pure Fire & Brimstone" as Santa came down from his flat to deal with the crowds.
